selected_skills.name: identify_spatial_relationships
selected_skills.purpose: To determine the relationships between angles in the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image data and specify the reference and target objects as the angles and points in the diagram to identify spatial relationships.

selected_skills.name: map_angle_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the calculated angle to the correct multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated angle and the provided options to find the correct option label.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_angle_from_known_angles
new_skill_specs.purpose: To calculate an unknown angle using known angles and their relationships.
edge_cases: No direct relationship between known and unknown angles
